allergies.name: Peanuts
allergies.description: An allergy to peanuts, a common ingredient in many foods
symptoms: Swelling of the lips, face, tongue and throat

allergies.name: Milk
allergies.description: An allergy to milk or dairy products

allergies.description: An allergy to eggs or egg products
symptoms: Swelling of the lips, face, tongue and throat

allergies.description: An allergy to soy or soy products
symptoms: Swelling of the lips, face, tongue and throat

allergies.description: An allergy to wheat or wheat products
symptoms: Swelling of the lips, face, tongue and throat

allergies.description: An allergy to fish, such as salmon or tuna

symptoms: Swelling of the lips, face, tongue and throat

allergies.name: Bread

allergies.name: Fruits
